nodes.text: So how goes it with you?
I'm starting a new song -

'I don't want to argue, I don't want to fight,
But you've stolen my heart like a thief in the night.
All I want to do is to make things right, 
So let's talk things over in the cruel moonlight.'
What do you think?
You are really getting good at song composing. You're going to be a star someday.
The rhyme is tight so it's quite alright.
It sounds a little Flat. You got to B Sharp to be a Bard.
I hear most of the stuff was returned to its owners last night. Guess we won't have to worry about any more thefts.
I'm glad we got relief from the Thief. I'd lament if off he went with my instrument. Sometimes crime does repay.
I'm the one who caught the Thief.
Really? How did you catch him? Who was it?

options.text: Tell the Truth About the Kwirk

nodes.text: I heard noise outside our room, so I snuck out and set a trap. When the trap went off, I found that the Thief was a Kwirk. I told him that he had to return everything or I would take him to Mr. Terk.
So even Kwirks dread Mr. Terk? You caught the con, Shawn - Good work.
I heard a noise in the hall in the middle of the night, so I snuck out of the room to check it out. I saw a mysterious shadow moving towards the Great Hall, so I followed it.
I heard the sound of the Hall of Heroes door open and close, but by the time I got into the Hall, there was no one in sight!
Wait, there's only one door in the Hall of Heroes...
Right - so here I was, in the middle of the night, alone in a room with the thief... who was nowhere in sight!
So I hid behind a statue and waited for the thief to appear...  Finally, I saw movement in one corner of the room... I jumped up and confronted the thief!
Who was it? What happened then?
It was a Kwirk!
So the thief who gave us grief when he lurked in the woodwork was a jerk of a Kwirk? Good work!
When I heard a noice outside our door last night, I snuck out and followed a shadowy figure down the hall. Turns out, the thief was Caesari Sosi. He confessed everything when I confronted him.
You confronted Sosi? There's something about that guy that gives me the creeps. I wouldn't want to meet him alone in a dark corridor. I'm impressed you stood up to him like that.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean the Room

nodes.text: Why don't you clean up your mess so we can tell whenever anything is missing or stolen from this room?
I'll try to get around to cleaning up sometime.
Well, now that the thief is caught - it really doesn't matter, does it?
I've got to say that this display of disarray dismays me. Thus my plea to thee is to free the floor from clutter galore before I snore.
I'm grieved to hear your sincere funk at my junk. I shall try to comply - or have a good alibi.
Look, this place is such a mess, you can't tell if something was stolen or not. Why don't you do us both a favor and clean it up?
I'll try to get around to it.
I'll think about it.
Maybe tonight I can sleep without being disturbed by noise.
I'll try not to snore fortissimo con forza.
Try not to snore at all, okay?
